task.title: Manage Security Groups
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your security groups and create, modify and delete security groups. You can page through the list of security groups by clicking the navigation buttons at the bottom of the screen.

step.cmd: You can toggle between the table view and the grid view by clicking the appropriate icon next to the View label at the top right of the screen.
Sort the security groups list by selecting a sort order using the Sort by drop-down list box.

task.title: Searching and Filtering the Security Groups List

step.cmd: To perform a simple search/filter, type some search text into the search text box at the top right of the page.
For more precise filtering and searching, you can add one or more filters by clicking one of the available filters in the Filter by section on the right side of the page.
Click the Create New Security Group button. The Create Security Group page will appear.

task.title: Viewing Details of a Security Group
task.shortdesc: You can expand a security group in the list to see details about the security group, including tags and rules associated with the security group.

step.cmd: Click the name of the security group in the list of security groups.
step.info: The details page for the selected security group will open.

task.title: Actions
task.shortdesc: Each entry in the security group list has a context menu, accessible in the Actions column. Clicking the action icon brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected security group.
